Production Co: Paramount Pictures, Eddie Murphy Productions, Don Simpson/Jerry Bruckheimer Films
Synopsis: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.
Title: Beverly Hills Cop II
